title: Ain't they the blokes that dig drains or something
creator_credit: Melbourne and Metropolitan Board of Works
brief_description: A public relations film made for the Melbourne and Metropolitan Board of Works. It shows the great variety of the activities undertaken by the Board of Works extending over a period of twenty-four hours
